title: Dont have access to old email so i can't recover password
body:
So i sent in a ticket to recover my account about a week ago with no reply yet, any who i just started to get back into the game but i no longer have access to my old email account to recover my password due to it getting hacked. How long due tickets usually take to get submitted? I have made a new league account but i really don't want to grind again. If anyone could help me that would be amazing.
Thanks

replies.body: If you have another secure email you can use, make sure to use that one in your [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should still be able to help you out! Sometimes it can take a little while to get a response depending on the current size of the ticket queues, but rest assured we'll be responding relatively soon. In extreme cases it could take up to a day, but generally, it only takes a couple hours.
